00027 #ifndef __BKE_GLOBAL_H__
00028 #define __BKE_GLOBAL_H__
00029 
00039 #include "DNA_listBase.h"
00040 
00041 #ifdef __cplusplus
00042 extern "C" {
00043 #endif
00044 
00045 /* forwards */
00046 struct Main;
00047 struct Object;
00048 struct BME_Glob;
00049 
00050 typedef struct Global {
00051 
00052     /* active pointers */
00053     struct Main *main;
00054     
00055     /* strings: lastsaved */
00056     char ima[1024], lib[1024]; /* 1024 = FILE_MAX */
00057 
00058     /* flag: if != 0 G.main->name contains valid relative base path */
00059     int relbase_valid;
00060 
00061     /* strings of recent opened files */
00062     struct ListBase recent_files;
00063         
00064     short afbreek, moving, file_loaded;
00065     char background;
00066     char factory_startup;
00067     short winpos, displaymode;  /* used to be in Render */
00068     short rendering;            /* to indicate render is busy, prevent renderwindow events etc */
00069 
00070     short rt;
00071     int f;
00072     int debug;
00073 
00074     /* Used for BMesh transformations */
00075     struct BME_Glob *editBMesh;
00076     
00077     /* Frank's variables */
00078     int save_over;
00079 
00080     /* Rob's variables (keep here for WM recode) */
00081     int have_quicktime;
00082     int ui_international;
00083     int charstart;
00084     int charmin;
00085     int charmax;
00086     struct VFont *selfont;
00087     struct ListBase ttfdata;
00088 
00089     /* this variable is written to / read from FileGlobal->fileflags */
00090     int fileflags;
00091     
00092     /* save the allowed windowstate of blender when using -W or -w */
00093     int windowstate;
00094 } Global;

00096 /* **************** GLOBAL ********************* */
00097 
00098 /* G.f */
00099 #define G_RENDER_OGL    (1 <<  0)
00100 #define G_SWAP_EXCHANGE (1 <<  1)
00101 /* also uses G_FILE_AUTOPLAY */
00102 /* #define G_RENDER_SHADOW  (1 <<  3) */ /* temp flag, removed */
00103 #define G_BACKBUFSEL    (1 <<  4)
00104 #define G_PICKSEL       (1 <<  5)
00105 
00106 /* #define G_FACESELECT (1 <<  8) use (mesh->editflag & ME_EDIT_PAINT_MASK) */
00107 
00108 #define G_SCRIPT_AUTOEXEC (1 << 13)
00109 #define G_SCRIPT_OVERRIDE_PREF (1 << 14) /* when this flag is set ignore the userprefs */
00110 
00111 /* #define G_NOFROZEN   (1 << 17) also removed */
00112 /* #define G_GREASEPENCIL   (1 << 17)   also removed */
00113 
00114 /* #define G_AUTOMATKEYS    (1 << 30)   also removed */
00115 
00116 /* G.debug */
00117 enum {
00118     G_DEBUG =           (1 << 0), /* general debug flag, print more info in unexpected cases */
00119     G_DEBUG_FFMPEG =    (1 << 1),
00120     G_DEBUG_PYTHON =    (1 << 2), /* extra python info */
00121     G_DEBUG_EVENTS =    (1 << 3), /* input/window/screen events */
00122     G_DEBUG_WM =        (1 << 4)  /* operator, undo */
00123 };
00124 
00125 #define G_DEBUG_ALL  (G_DEBUG | G_DEBUG_FFMPEG | G_DEBUG_PYTHON | G_DEBUG_EVENTS | G_DEBUG_WM)
00126 
00127 
00128 /* G.fileflags */
00129 
00130 #define G_AUTOPACK               (1 << 0)
00131 #define G_FILE_COMPRESS          (1 << 1)
00132 #define G_FILE_AUTOPLAY          (1 << 2)
00133 #define G_FILE_ENABLE_ALL_FRAMES (1 << 3)               /* deprecated */
00134 #define G_FILE_SHOW_DEBUG_PROPS  (1 << 4)               /* deprecated */
00135 #define G_FILE_SHOW_FRAMERATE    (1 << 5)               /* deprecated */
00136 /* #define G_FILE_SHOW_PROFILE   (1 << 6) */            /* deprecated */
00137 #define G_FILE_LOCK              (1 << 7)
00138 #define G_FILE_SIGN              (1 << 8)
00139 /* #define G_FILE_PUBLISH        (1 << 9) */            /* deprecated */
00140 #define G_FILE_NO_UI             (1 << 10)
00141 /* #define G_FILE_GAME_TO_IPO    (1 << 11) */           /* deprecated */
00142 #define G_FILE_GAME_MAT          (1 << 12)              /* deprecated */
00143 /* #define G_FILE_DISPLAY_LISTS  (1 << 13) */           /* deprecated */
00144 #define G_FILE_SHOW_PHYSICS      (1 << 14)              /* deprecated */
00145 #define G_FILE_GAME_MAT_GLSL     (1 << 15)              /* deprecated */
00146 /* #define G_FILE_GLSL_NO_LIGHTS     (1 << 16) */       /* deprecated */
00147 #define G_FILE_GLSL_NO_SHADERS   (1 << 17)              /* deprecated */
00148 #define G_FILE_GLSL_NO_SHADOWS   (1 << 18)              /* deprecated */
00149 #define G_FILE_GLSL_NO_RAMPS     (1 << 19)              /* deprecated */
00150 #define G_FILE_GLSL_NO_NODES     (1 << 20)              /* deprecated */
00151 #define G_FILE_GLSL_NO_EXTRA_TEX (1 << 21)              /* deprecated */
00152 #define G_FILE_IGNORE_DEPRECATION_WARNINGS  (1 << 22)   /* deprecated */
00153 #define G_FILE_RECOVER           (1 << 23)
00154 #define G_FILE_RELATIVE_REMAP    (1 << 24)
00155 #define G_FILE_HISTORY           (1 << 25)
00156 #define G_FILE_MESH_COMPAT       (1 << 26)              /* BMesh option to save as older mesh format */
00157 
00158 /* G.windowstate */
00159 #define G_WINDOWSTATE_USERDEF       0
00160 #define G_WINDOWSTATE_BORDER        1
00161 #define G_WINDOWSTATE_FULLSCREEN    2
00162 
00163 /* ENDIAN_ORDER: indicates what endianness the platform where the file was
00164  * written had. */
00165 #if !defined( __BIG_ENDIAN__ ) && !defined( __LITTLE_ENDIAN__ )
00166 #  error Either __BIG_ENDIAN__ or __LITTLE_ENDIAN__ must be defined.
00167 #endif
00168 
00169 /* there is really no good place for this */
00170 #if defined(FREE_WINDOWS) && ((__GNUC__ < 4) || ((__GNUC__ == 4) && (__GNUC_MINOR__ < 6)))
00171 #  error "Mingw requires GCC 4.6 minimum"
00172 #endif
00173 
00174 #define L_ENDIAN    1
00175 #define B_ENDIAN    0
00176 
00177 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00178 #  define ENDIAN_ORDER B_ENDIAN
00179 #else
00180 #  define ENDIAN_ORDER L_ENDIAN
00181 #endif

00184 #define G_TRANSFORM_OBJ         1
00185 #define G_TRANSFORM_EDIT        2
00186 #define G_TRANSFORM_MANIP       4
00187 #define G_TRANSFORM_PARTICLE    8
